name: Zombie-Man
description: The basic plot as follows: The main protagonist, Zack Darwin ,  mid-thirties to late thirties, an eight veteran on the police department is shot and left for dead in the middle of a crime in progress gone bad. He just happens to be in the historic district of the city where many senior citizens live. In process of being shot, he saves an elderly lady’s unaware of what she is and her special gifts. An ambulance transports to the nearest ER available, but severely of his wounds are too obviously and he is pronounced D.O.A.    Later that same week, the elderly woman Darwin saved has people she knows break into the city morgue and steal his corpse before it can be buried with honor by family and honor. The corpse is taken to a secret laboratory and re-animated Zack Darwin is retransformed with unnatural and scientific means combined and given a new mission in the fight against crime and vice in the city controlled by the evil Big Boss.
